Articles.Content:
Maybe in the future we'll see "throttle" groups which only set the throttle on certain engines. These throttle groups could be extra throttle gauges placed to the left of the "master" throttle group, and one could click a throttle group to "engage" or take control of it.

It's not a bad idea considering that I was about to suggest the VAB/SPH system way back in 0.16 (but reluctant to do so because I feared that people might find it "too complicated") to find the next day that Squad had announced that exact feature.

Also, nobody's forced to live with 6 different throttle bars on the side since it's totally optional.
